description.value: Maps RelatieSnomedCodelijst codes as found in the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) ContactPerson-v4.1 (2024))](https://zibs.nl/wiki/ContactPerson-v4.1(2024EN))) to RelatieCodelijst codes in the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) ContactPerson-v3.4 ((2020))](https://zibs.nl/wiki/ContactPerson-v3.4(2020EN)))

copyright.value: Copyright and related rights waived via CC0, https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/. This does not apply to information from third parties, for example a medical terminology system. The implementer alone is responsible for identifying and obtaining any necessary licenses or authorizations to utilize third party IP in connection with the specification or otherwise.

comment.value: The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code with equivalence 'equals' to the source code. The original value is more specific, namely 'Adoptive brother'.
The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code with equivalence 'equals' to the source code. The original value is more specific, namely 'Adoptive sister'.
The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code with equivalence 'equals' to the source code. The original value is more specific, namely 'Male cousin'.
The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code with equivalence 'equals' to the source code. The original value is more specific, namely 'Female cousin'.

The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code with equivalence 'equals' to the source code. The original value is more specific, namely 'Stepbrother'. The target CodeSystem does however contain the code STPBRO ‘stepbrother’ which could be used optionally with equivalence ‘equals’, as the target ValueSet is of binding Extensible.

The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code with equivalence 'equals' to the source code. The original value is more specific, namely 'Stepdaughter'. The target CodeSystem does however contain the code STPDAU ‘stepdaughter’ which could be used optionally with equivalence ‘equals’, as the target ValueSet is of binding Extensible.

The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code with equivalence 'equals' to the source code. The original value is more specific, namely 'Stepsister'. The target CodeSystem does however contain the code STPSIS ‘stepsister’ which could be used optionally with equivalence ‘equals’, as the target ValueSet is of binding Extensible.

The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code with equivalence 'equals' to the source code. The original value is more specific, namely 'Stepson'. The target CodeSystem does however contain the code STPSON ‘stepson’ which could be used optionally with equivalence ‘equals’, as the target ValueSet is of binding Extensible.
The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code for mapping the source code. The original value is ‘Adopted Child’.
The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code for mapping the source code. The original value is ‘Adoptive parent’.

The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code for mapping the source code. The original value is ‘Adoptive sibling’. The target CodeSystem does however contain the code SIB ‘sibling’ which could be used optionally with equivalence ‘wider’, as the target ValueSet is of binding Extensible.

The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code for mapping the source code. The original value is ‘Partner in relationship’. The target CodeSystem does however contain the code SIGOTHR ‘significant other’ which could be used optionally with equivalence ‘wider’, as the target ValueSet is of binding Extensible.

The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code for mapping the source code. The original value is ‘Ex-partner’. The target CodeSystem does however contain the code FMRSPS ‘former spouse’ which could be used optionally, as the target ValueSet is of binding Extensible, in case the two ex-partners used to be married.

The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code for mapping the source code. The original value is ‘Foster child’. The target CodeSystem does however contain the code CHLDFOST ‘foster child’ which could be used optionally with equivalence ‘equals’, as the target ValueSet is of binding Extensible.

The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code for mapping the source code. The original value is ‘Foster parent’. The target CodeSystem does however contain the code PRNFOST ‘foster parent’ which could be used optionally with equivalence ‘equals’, as the target ValueSet is of binding Extensible.
The target ValueSet and target CodeSystem don't contain any suitable codes for mapping the source code.

The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code for mapping the source code. The original value is ‘Grandchild’. The target CodeSystem does however contain the code GCHILD ‘grandchild’ which could be used optionally with equivalence ‘equals’, as the target ValueSet is of binding Extensible.

The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code for mapping the source code. The original value is ‘Grandparent’. The target CodeSystem does however contain the code GPARNT ‘grandparent’ which could be used optionally with equivalence ‘equals’, as the target ValueSet is of binding Extensible.

The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code for mapping the source code. The original value is ‘Neighbor’. The target CodeSystem does however contain the code NBOR ‘neighbor’ which could be used optionally with equivalence ‘equals’, as the target ValueSet is of binding Extensible.

The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code for mapping the source code. The original value is ‘Parent’. The target CodeSystem does however contain the code PRN ‘parent’ which could be used optionally with equivalence ‘equals’, as the target ValueSet is of binding Extensible.

The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code for mapping the source code. The original value is ‘Parent in-law’. The target CodeSystem does however contain the code PRNINLAW ‘parent in-law’ which could be used optionally with equivalence ‘equals’, as the target ValueSet is of binding Extensible.

The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code for mapping the source code. The original value is ‘Roommate’. The target CodeSystem does however contain the code ROOM ‘Roommate’ which could be used optionally with equivalence ‘equals’, as the target ValueSet is of binding Extensible.

The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code for mapping the source code. The original value is ‘Sibling’. The target CodeSystem does however contain the code SIB ‘sibling’ which could be used optionally with equivalence ‘equals’, as the target ValueSet is of binding Extensible.

The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code for mapping the source code. The original value is ‘Spouse’. The target CodeSystem does however contain the code SPS ‘spouse’ which could be used optionally with equivalence ‘equals’, as the target ValueSet is of binding Extensible.

The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code for mapping the source code. The original value is ‘Stepchild’. The target CodeSystem does however contain the code STPCHLD ‘step child’ which could be used optionally with equivalence ‘equals’, as the target ValueSet is of binding Extensible.

The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code for mapping the source code. The original value is ‘Stepparent’. The target CodeSystem does however contain the code STPPRN ‘step parent’ which could be used optionally with equivalence ‘equals’, as the target ValueSet is of binding Extensible.

The target ValueSet doesn't contain a suitable code for mapping the source code. The original value is ‘Stepsibling’. The target CodeSystem does however contain the code STPSIB ‘step sibling’ which could be used optionally with equivalence ‘equals’, as the target ValueSet is of binding Extensible.
